DOC.brief_summary: The aim study ass whether high intensive statin therapy could regress carotid atherosclerotic plaque determine High-Resolution Contrast Enhanced Magnetic Resonance imaging ( CE-MRI ) . Enrolled patient baseline CE-MRI examination screen carotid atherosclerotic plaque randomize either low dose Rosuvastatin ( 5mg ) group high dose Rosuvastatin ( 20mg ) group . After 26 week , patient receive CE-MRI examination pair baseline follow-up CE-MRI assessment analyze blinded fashion . Moreover , lipid level major adverse cardiovascular event also evaluate follow-up .
DOC.brief_title: A High-Resolution Magnetic Resonance Imaging Study Evaluate Effect Rosuvastatin Carotid Atherosclerotic Plaques
DOC.criteria: Patients coronary artery disease carotid atherosclerotic plaque hyperlipideimia old myocardial infarction Planning coronary stenting Heart failure Uncontrolled hypertension（≥200/110mmHg ) Uncontrolled diabetes mellitus ( HbA1C≥9.5 % ) Hepatic insufficiency Renal dysfunction Cancer
